text:
Words have consequences. 
Anti-Semitic words have led to violence and death for generations of Jews, including Jews today - around the world and in America.
This is intensely personal for me and I wanted my colleagues to understand why.pic.twitter.com/Rxnmtxz0OQ

html: We learned from Barr that he disagreed with the Special Counsel’s legal theories, but he wouldn’t tell us what they are. AG Barr has made weeks of headlines describing the facts, but he refused to release the facts. This isn’t transparency. This is a public relations campaign.
text:
We learned from Barr that he disagreed with the Special Counsel’s legal theories, but he wouldn’t tell us what they are.

AG Barr has made weeks of headlines describing the facts, but he refused to release the facts.

This isn’t transparency.

This is a public relations campaign.

html: The AG told us the report was done for him. He told us we should be grateful. He told us what the bottom line should be. It showed such contempt for Congress, the press, and the American people to spin the report - again - before releasing it.
text:
The AG told us the report was done for him. 

He told us we should be grateful. 

He told us what the bottom line should be. 

It showed such contempt for Congress, the press, and the American people to spin the report - again - before releasing it.

html: After Pulse we shut down the House floor to demand action on gun violence. After Parkland we marched to demand action on gun violence. This week, we will vote to require background checks on all gun sales. I’m voting YES on #HR8
text:
After Pulse we shut down the House floor to demand action on gun violence. 

After Parkland we marched to demand action on gun violence. 

This week, we will vote to require background checks on all gun sales. 

I’m voting YES on #HR8

I’ve waited too long to vote YES on basic gun safety bills. 

I will proudly do so this week. 

Trump’s veto threat shows that he stands with gun corporations over the American people who broadly support background checks and don’t have a corrupt view of 2A.

html: One of the DeVos Commission on School Safety recommendations is adoption of extreme risk protection order laws. I introduced the Jake Laird Act to help states keep guns out of dangerous hands. It’s bipartisan. It’s working in FL, IN & 11 other states. It could save lives.
text:
One of the DeVos Commission on School Safety recommendations is adoption of extreme risk protection order laws. 

I introduced the Jake Laird Act to help states keep guns out of dangerous hands. 

It’s bipartisan. 

It’s working in FL, IN & 11 other states.

It could save lives.

Trump likes to talk tough about law/order & secure borders but now he’s proud to shut down agencies that do that work?

html: I’m so, so sad today. Sad for the searing loss, that hurts like hell every Dec 14th for those parents, my friends. And sad that I sent my youngest off to 1st grade this morning, and that I work with people who care more about politics than making sure he comes home safe.
text:
I’m so, so sad today. 

Sad for the searing loss, that hurts like hell every Dec 14th for those parents, my friends.

And sad that I sent my youngest off to 1st grade this morning, and that I work with people who care more about politics than making sure he comes home safe.
